basic_info.description: Iâ€™m Ekaterina Khoroshilova, delving into the tech world with a diverse background. From the meticulous world of pharmacy tech and the artistic realms of photography to serving as a yeoman in the U.S. Coast Guard and exploring marine biology, my journey has been rich and varied. With a BS in Informatics, I've cultivated a deep appreciation for diverse perspectives and problem-solving approaches. My passion lies at the intersection of technology and creativity, particularly in gaming and AI. Currently pursuing a Google UX Design Certificate, I am dedicated to building applications that are not only technically proficient but also deeply engaging and user-centric. Letâ€™s connect and collaborate to transform innovative ideas into impactful digital realities!

projects.title: Lost Hub
projects.description: Lost Hub is a contemporary digital platform designed to modernize the traditional lost and found system. It provides a user-friendly and centralized solution for reporting and finding lost items, streamlining the process for more efficient retrieval of belongings. The platform's integration with the Google Maps API enables precise location tracking, while Auth0 ensures secure authentication, and Axios facilitates robust data handling.

projects.title: Just Talk Chat
projects.description: Just Talk Chat is a dynamic chat room application connecting users globally for real-time conversations. Its standout feature is the built-in translation, allowing seamless communication across different languages. Powered by advanced AI, the platform includes a proactive filter to identify and mitigate toxic messages, ensuring a positive and safe communication environment. This innovative application is designed to bridge communication gaps and foster understanding among diverse user groups.

projects.title: Lorecraft
projects.description: LoreCraft is an innovative app that leverages the power of GPT-3 and AI imaging to provide users with a seamless experience in creating unique characters and their backstories instantly. Crafted with React.js, it integrates various components to streamline the process of character creation, letting users delve deeper into the realm of creativity.

projects.title: City Explorer
projects.description: City Explorer is a dynamic web app that provides a detailed map of the selected city, alongside an accurate weather forecast and popular events. It enhances the user's exploration experience by showcasing a carousel of movies that feature the city in their title. Whether you're planning a trip or simply curious about a city's cinematic footprint, City Explorer has got you covered.

projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.description: My first project involved collaborative teamwork under a tight deadline. The workout tracker, a testament to our efforts, diligently records individuals' weekly and daily workouts alongside prescribed reps and sets for each exercise. Additionally, a comprehensive exercise compendium offers guidance on proper execution, reflecting our commitment to a holistic fitness experience.
